headline: Robinhood Is a ‘Prime Candidate’ for S&P 500 Addition, BofA Says
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Robinhood Markets Inc. is a “prime candidate” to enter the S&P 500 Index in the rebalancing set to be announced Friday, a milestone that would spur passive funds to snap up shares of the online brokerage, according to Bank of America Corp. headline: Robinhood, AppLovin and More Stocks That Could Join the S&P 500 on Friday
summary: AppLovin Robinhood Markets Cheniere Energy  and  Interactive Brokers  top a list of potential additions to the  when the index’s quarterly rebalancing occurs later this month.  An announcement of any changes to the S&P 500 index components is likely to come around 5:15 p.m. ET on Friday.  Since mid-2022, S&P Dow Jones Indices has made changes to the S&P 500 and other indexes it manages each quarter in conjunction with the rebalancing, which involves adjusting the weight of each component based on changes in shares outstanding—a reflection of stock buybacks and any share issuance.

headline: Robinhood Shares Hit All-Time High Following Bitstamp Deal Closure
summary: HOOD stock hits an all-time high after Bitstamp deal closure. The buyout along with unveiling the latest crypto, trading and banking features will drive growth.

headline: Robinhood stock rises on S&P 500 inclusion speculation
summary: Investing.com -- Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) shares climbed 3% amid market speculation that the online brokerage could be a potential new addition to the S&P 500 index. The uptick follows comments from analysts suggesting the company is a ’prime candidate’ for the index’s next rebalancing.

headline: Bitstamp falls into Robinhood's hands - Crypto Recap
summary: Robinhood is changing scale. By acquiring Bitstamp for $200m, the American fintech company is not only expanding its offering, but also taking over a historic pillar of the global cryptocurrency...

headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks with Promising Prospects
summary: The best-performing stocks typically have robust sales growth, increasing margins, and rising returns on capital, and those that can maintain this trifecta year in and year out often become the legends of the investing world.
